mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , F.file_url , T.hope_method , T.hope_location , T.hope_address , T.hope_location_latitude , T.hope_location_longitude , CASE WHEN T.type = 'SALES' THEN (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_PURCHASE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status != 'CANCELED') WHEN T.type = 'EXCHANGE' THEN (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_EXCHANGE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status != 'CANCELED') ELSE 0 END AS suggestCount , T.created_at FROM TRADE T LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = T.file_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT SI.id , SI.trade_id , SI.gacha_id , SI.gacha_item_id AS gachaItemId , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = SI.gacha_id AND id = SI.gacha_item_id) AS gachaItemName , SI.count , SI.current_count , SI.price , SI.created_at FROM TRADE_SALES_ITEM SI WHERE SI.trade_id = #{tradeId} ORDER BY SI.created_at ASC

SELECT EI.id , EI.trade_id , EI.gacha_id , EI.give_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = EI.gacha_id AND id = EI.give_item_id) AS giveItemName , EI.want_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = EI.gacha_id AND id = EI.want_item_id) AS wantItemName , created_at , updated_at FROM TRADE_EXCHANGE_ITEM EI WHERE EI.trade_id = #{tradeId} ORDER BY EI.created_at ASC
